title: Children's Vogue Patterns
additional-note: First renewal under the Children's Vogue Patterns Catalog title has a copyright date of March 31, 1927; first renewal under the Children's Vogue Patterns title has a copyright date of January 25, 1928.  Library coverage of this serial is spotty, but issue dates in the renewal records suggest that Children's Vogue Patterns and Children's Vogue Patterns Catalogue are the same seasonal publication, distinct from Vogue Patterns.
